meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Matt Kellison Jill Rausch Lisa Schlitt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7461.

td.p: Matt Kellison, an economist from Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
Jill Rausch, a captioner from Phoenix, Arizona
Lisa Schlitt, a microbiologist from Berwyn, Pennsylvania (whose 6-day cash winnings total $139,100)

tr.td: FAMILIAR ACTING FACES
A RUDE AWAKENING
A FICTIONAL DEATH
FOREIGN EXCHANGE
"MIS"QUOTES
RENTING A CAR

Matt
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Lisa
Jill
Matt
BROADWAY SHOWS IN LATIN
VENICE
ALLITERATIVE 2-WORD TERMS
CLASSICAL MUSIC
HARD "G"
(Alex: And then you get to travel with me. A visit to the brand-new...)
NATIONAL MUSEUM OF AFRICAN-AMERICAN HISTORY AND CULTURE

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_6_5', 'clue_DJ_6_5_stuck', '(Alex: And just an added note from me, a personal one--if you get a chance to visit our nation\'s capital, go to that museum if you\'re interested in American history--very important.)

Malcolm X

Matt
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_6_5', 'clue_DJ_6_5_stuck', '(Alex delivers the clue from the National Museum of African American History and Culture in Washington, D.C.) The tape recorder was used by this man, whose ideas for black activism couldn\'t be contained by the Nation of Islam, leading to the sad correctness of his prediction in his autobiography that, "I, too, will die by violence"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Alex delivers the clue from the National Museum of African American History and Culture in Washington, D.C.) The tape recorder was used by this man, whose ideas for black activism couldn't be contained by the Nation of Islam, leading to the sad correctness of his prediction in his autobiography that, "I, too, will die by violence"

Jill
Matt
